observation.output:
=== Reproducing Separability Matrix Issue ===

Using the exact examples from the issue description...

Test 1: Simple compound model (from issue)
cm = m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5)
separability_matrix(cm):
[[ True False]
 [False  True]]
Expected from issue: [[ True False]
 [False  True]]
Matches issue: True

Test 2: Extended compound model (from issue)
extended = m.Pix2Sky_TAN() & m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5)
separability_matrix(extended):
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
Expected from issue:
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
Matches issue: True

Test 3: Nested compound model (THE PROBLEMATIC CASE)
nested = m.Pix2Sky_TAN() & cm  (where cm = m.Linear1D(10) & m.Linear1D(5))
separability_matrix(nested):
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
Buggy result from issue:
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True  True]
 [False False  True  True]]
Shows bug (matches buggy result): False
Correct (matches expected): True
✅ Bug appears to be fixed in this version
